snippet.title: HEAVY AS STONE - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3045530/HEAVY_AS_STONE/

Follow:
https://twitter.com/HEAVY_AS_STONE

HEAVY AS STONE is an investigative Horror RPG game played in the first-person perspective. Set in the 1920s, explore the town of Terminal in search of your life insurance clients' bodies, construct likely narratives regarding their fates, and assign payouts. As you get closer to the truth about your own fate and your reality breaks apart, you must defend against your own antagonistic mental affliction as well as cults, gangs, and horrors beyond comprehension.
